text: 25 March 2025 : Tuesday Mar 2025 : Tuesday See More Photos of:  Book This video explores Many Lives, Many Masters by Dr. Brian Weiss, offering personal insights and reflections on its impact. The book follows Dr. Weiss’s transformation from a skeptic to a believer in past life regression after working with a particularly troubled patient named Katherine. Her journey through a dozen of her 86 past lives not only helped her heal from severe anxiety and other medical issues but also provided profound evidence of reincarnation. The discussion highlights how the book bridges the gap between science and spirituality, making it accessible even to skeptics.
html:
25

March 2025 : Tuesday Mar 2025 : Tuesday

See More Photos of:  Book

This video explores Many Lives, Many Masters by Dr. Brian Weiss, offering personal insights and reflections on its impact. The book follows Dr. Weiss’s transformation from a skeptic to a believer in past life regression after working with a particularly troubled patient named Katherine. Her journey through a dozen of her 86 past lives not only helped her heal from severe anxiety and other medical issues but also provided profound evidence of reincarnation. The discussion highlights how the book bridges the gap between science and spirituality, making it accessible even to skeptics.
